extendedInfo.description: An exceptional cultural guide. A guide to the traditional cider culture of Frankfurt. The best Cider Inns of Frankfurt will be presented.Where do you find the best StÃ¶ffche (synonym for cider in Frankfurt) and where the best traditional food. Where are the nicest traditional Inns. Frankfurt is more than Banks and Business.Those who have never had a cider in a traditional Cider Inn do not know anything about Frankfurt!The listing of the Inns will be continoulsy extended, currently there are 26 recommendations. The selection of the Cider Inn's does not claim to be total. But it claims to list the best and not the most! It is an entirely subjective selection done by the author and is based on years of exhausted testing.Cheers and enjoy your meal!
